CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains PCI boxes to MOT then leaves the room
MOT and CHI enter the room
CHI stands on the opposite side of the room . CHI looks across the room toward MOT and the boxes
CHI reaches for a box on the table
<$=1> MOT closes the flap of the bottom box
MOT moves around behind CHI to close box
CHI looks up toward the boxes on the table
CHI looks up . <aft> CHI follows MOT across the room
MOT walks across the room then sits down on the floor
<aft> MOT places a box on the floor
CHI looks down then looks up at MOT briefly . <aft> CHI sits on the floor beside MOT with her back to the camera
CHI has her back to the camera
CHI looks down with her back to the camera
CHI places the book on the floor
CHI back is to the camera
CHI looks down with her back to the camera
MOT looks up at the camera then down at the book again
CHI has her back to the camera
MOT looks up at the camera
CHI points then looks up at MOT
CHI looks over at the door
INV opens the door then explains to MOT that she should play with CHI and make sure CHI is facing camera
MOT picks up CHI and moves her so she faces camera
CHI looks over toward the book
MOT places the book in CHI's lap
CHI sits facing the camera looking down at the book
<bef> MOT leans over and kisses CHI
CHI stands up with the book in hand . CHI places book in box
MOT stands up then walks across the room with the book box
MOT walks out of camera range
MOT begins to walk across the room as she holds the box in front of CHI
CHI turns so she is looking at the box
CHI looks at the box while walking across the room
MOT walks across the room then sits down on the floor
MOT places the box on the floor
CHI looks down then reaches for the box
MOT places CHI on the floor so she is facing camera
CHI sits on the floor next to MOT
MOT looks down over CHI's shoulder
CHI looks down at the puppets in her hands
CHI puts a puppet on her hand
MOT picks up the other puppet
CHI turns her body in MOT's direction while looking at the puppet on her hand
MOT puts the puppet on her hand
MOT touches CHI's puppet with her puppet
CHI reaches for MOT's puppet . CHI looks at MOT's puppet
MOT grabs CHI's puppet with her puppet
MOT helps CHI put the puppet on her hand properly
CHI looks at her own puppet
CHI moves the mouth of her puppet
MOT holds her puppet up in front of CHI
CHI looks down then up at MOT's puppet
CHI pretends to put a cookie in her puppets mouth
CHI pretends to pick up a cookie and feed it to MOT's puppet
MOT devours CHI's hand with her puppet then tickles CHI with her puppet
CHI leans away from MOT then turns and faces MOT
MOT leans back and looks at CHI
CHI pretends to feed both puppets
MOT looks down while holding her puppet out toward CHI
MOT moves a bit so she faces CHI completely . <aft> MOT leans toward CHI
CHI pretends to feed herself then MOT's puppet
CHI looks up at MOT and nods her head yes
MOT pretends chewing with her puppet
CHI looks up at MOT then reaches up and pretends to feed MOT
MOT pretends to pick up a cookie with her puppet's mouth then feed it to CHI
CHI looks up at MOT as she points to her own mouth
MOT looks down at CHI then at her own puppet
CHI looks at MOT then looks down and across the room briefly
CHI looks down then begins to stand up
CHI takes the puppet off of her hand
<bef> CHI looks behind her . CHI turns facing MOT as she kneels in front of MOT
CHI lays her puppet on the floor in front of MOT
<bef> MOT places CHI's puppet on the floor away from them using her puppet
CHI moves closer to MOT then reaches for both puppets
<aft> CHI puts the puppets in their box
MOT picks up the top half of the puppet box
CHI bounces on her legs excitedly then looks behind her as she begins to stand up
MOT holds the box cover up
<bef> CHI turns toward MOT then looks down
CHI takes the cover then closes the box
MOT assists CHI in closing the box
CHI gets up and starts running across the room
CHI turns around then reaches down for the puppet box
<aft> CHI picks up the box then puts it back on the table
<aft> MOT stands up and walks over to the table
MOT stands behind CHI visible from the waist down
CHI stands in front of the table looking up . <aft> CHI reaches up for a box
MOT takes a box off the top of the table
MOT turns and walks back to the center of the room
CHI skips across the room toward MOT
CHI trips and falls gently to the floor
<aft> CHI sits on the floor in front of MOT
MOT takes the top half of the box and puts it aside
MOT places the box bottom with the crayons and paper on one side of CHI
<aft> CHI takes paper out of the box
CHI looks down into the box
CHI takes a crayon out of the box
MOT picks up a crayon out of the box
MOT flips the box over then taps the bottom of the box
<bef> MOT puts the piece of paper on the box
<aft> MOT fidgets with two crayons that are on the box
CHI gets up on one knee and looks toward MOT
MOT holds a crayon up in front of CHI
CHI takes a crayon from MOT
CHI holds a crayon out toward MOT
MOT takes a crayon from CHI
CHI leans back and looks down
CHI looks down at MOT drawing
CHI looks down as she reaches for something on the floor
MOT places the crayon on the floor
CHI looks up and holds a crayon out toward MOT
MOT takes the crayon then begins to color
CHI leans back and looks down
<aft> MOT holds the crayon out to CHI
CHI leans back and looks down at the crayon in her hand
CHI picks up a crayon then it rolls toward MOT
the crayon slips out of CHI's hand as she goes to hand it to MOT
CHI holds out a crayon toward MOT . CHI looks at MOT
MOT leans back as she stops drawing
CHI picks up a different crayon off the rug beside her
CHI reaches over to MOT with a crayon
MOT takes the crayon CHI offers then hands a different crayon to CHI
<aft> CHI leans back and looks down
CHI flips the paper off the box
<bef> MOT flips the crayons and paper box over
CHI turns and looks over her shoulder
MOT puts away some crayons and paper
CHI puts some crayons and paper away
CHI puts another piece of paper into the box
MOT holds the box cover out to CHI
CHI takes the cover then closes the box
end of PCI- Crayons and Paper
CHI kneels on the box then stands up and looks over her shoulder . <aft> CHI runs across the room
CHI turns around and looks in the direction of MOT . <aft> CHI runs over to MOT and takes the box from her
<aft> CHI carries the box over to the table and places it on top of the table
MOT picks up a box off the table then walks out of camera range
CHI looks up at MOT then follows MOT across the room
MOT puts the box down on the floor in the middle of the room
CHI begins to open the box
CHI sits down on the floor next to MOT
CHI looks at the box as she tries to open it
MOT pulls house out of the box then moves the box out of the way
CHI places the house upright in front of her
MOT places a toy person in the chimney of the house
<bef> CHI looks up where MOT placed toy . CHI reaches into the house
CHI holds a toy up toward MOT then looks down
MOT leans forward into camera range
CHI looks on as MOT tries to open house
CHI fidgets with the front of the house
<bef> CHI swings one half of the house open
CHI looks down into the house
MOT leans over the house and looks inside
CHI holds a couple of toys in her hands
CHI bends down to look into the garage
CHI pulls the car out of the garage . <aft> CHI puts toy into the car then pushes the car
MOT is out of camera range
CHI fidgets with the garage as she pushes the car with the toys in it across the rug
CHI moves a bit out of camera range
CHI has her back to the camera . CHI moves out of then back into camera range as she pushes the car around
CHI parks the car in front of the house . <aft> CHI removes the toys from the car
MOT remains out of camera range
CHI puts a toy into the house
CHI puts the toy in the house
<aft> CHI leans back and looks into the house
CHI fidgets with the garage . <aft> CHI puts the car in the garage
<aft> MOT leans over the house and looks inside
<aft> MOT takes some toys out of the house
CHI leans back and looks down
CHI puts the toy person on the toy chair
CHI's activity is partially blocked by the house
CHI plays with the toy person
CHI's utterance cannot be heard fully due to background noise
CHI looks down as she plays
CHI leans back and looks down
MOT brings a toy person over the top of the house
MOT uses a different higher pitched voice in this sequence
CHI uses a different higher pitched voice
CHI pretends to be the waiter now
CHI looks up briefly toward MOT while holding a toy steady on the floor
MOT moves the house a bit so the full activity can be seen
MOT pretends to be the customer
CHI moves a toy into the house
CHI leans to one side and looks into the house
CHI leans back with a toy in her hand
CHI places pretend food on the toy table
MOT pretends to be the customer
CHI pretends to be the waiter
<aft> CHI looks up at MOT briefly then looks down
CHI pretends to place something on the table
<bef> CHI leans forward and reaches into the house
CHI reaches through the house with a toy and puts the toy person out the front door
MOT picks up the toy on the other side
CHI stands up as she looks down
CHI walks around the house a bit then reaches down
<aft> CHI fidgets with the front of the house
MOT places a toy on the rug by the garage
<bef> CHI sits down then leans forward and looks into the house
MOT leans over the house looking down
<bef> CHI plays with toys by the garage
CHI leans back and looks at the house
CHI turns and looks at the door
